title: Simulating data mapped to OMOP-CDM
text: R-package generation simulated datasets using observational healthcare databases mapped OMOP-CDM.

title: Extract exposure cohorts — extractCohorts
text: Extract exposure cohorts exposure table. function creates new table combined exposure cohorts stored.

Needs write permission. exposureDatabaseSchema database schema table exposure cohorts stored. cdmDatabaseSchema database schema cdm database stored.

what: Limit a cdm database to a cohort — limitCdmToCohort
title: Limit a cdm database to a cohort — limitCdmToCohort
text: Creates self-contained cdm database based patients included cohort.

title: Limit a cdm database to a cohort — limitCdmToCohort
code: limitCdmToCohort(   connectionDetails,   cdmDatabaseSchema,   exposureDatabaseSchema,   exposureTable,   outcomeDatabaseSchema,   outcomeTable,   resultDatabaseSchema,   cohortObservationPeriodTable,   includeOutcomePatients = FALSE,   limitTableNames = "all",   transferTableNames = "all",   saveDir )

title: Limit a cdm database to a cohort — limitCdmToCohort
text: connectionDetails connection details database. object type createConnectionDetails. cdmDatabaseSchema database schema cdm database stored. exposureDatabaseSchema database schema table exposure cohorts stored. exposureTable table exposure cohorts stored. outcomeDatabaseSchema database schema table outcome cohorts stored. outcomeTable table outcome cohorts. resultDatabaseSchema database schema table combined cohorts stored. Needs write permission. cohortObservationPeriodTable table new observation periods. includeOutcomePatients Whether include patients outcome cohorts limiting step. limitTableNames database tables limited cohorts. transferTableNames database tables transferred unchanged new database. saveDir directory limited cdm database stored.

title: Modify existing model — modifyExistingModel
text: Modify existing model updating coefficients

title: Modify existing model — modifyExistingModel
text: modelDir directory outcome models stored. outcomeId outcome id predicted model modified exposureIds exposure ids model modified. set -1, exposures affected . Consequently, effect modification present. newBetas list data frames columns column_label estimate. Column column_label contains covariate id coefficient replaced column estimate. length exposureIds, unless exposureIds -1.
